name: flowed
description: A fast and reliable flow manager and task runner for Node.js
author: Daniel Duarte <danieldd.ar@gmail.com> (https://github.com/daniel-duarte)

scripts.lint: tslint -p tsconfig.json -t verbose && tslint -p tsconfig.test.json -t verbose
scripts.format: tslint -p tsconfig.json -t verbose --fix && tslint -p tsconfig.test.json -t verbose --fix && prettier --write "src/**/*.ts" "src/**/*.js" && prettier --write "test/**/*.ts" "test/**/*.js"
scripts.release:prepare: ./ops/updateSonarProps.sh && rm -rf ./dist ./node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && npm-consider install --test && npm run format && npm run build && npm test && git status
